name: Ubuntu
postCreateCommand: git clone https://github.com/onyx-lang/onyx --depth 1 $HOME/onyx && cd $HOME/onyx && bash -c 'source settings.sh && ./build.sh compile install' && export ONYX_PATH=$HOME/.onyx && echo "export ONYX_PATH=\$HOME/.onyx" >> $HOME/.bashrc && export PATH=$PATH:$HOME/.onyx/bin && echo "export PATH=\$PATH:\$HOME/.onyx/bin" >> $HOME/.bashrc
